name: Venkatesh Akella
content: Venkatesh Akella Venkatesh Akella Professor Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering University of California, Davis Address Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering (Directions) 2117 Kemper Hall  (Map) One Shields Avenue University of California, Davis, CA 95616 Email      akella@ucdavis.edu Contact numbers 415-347-5764(office) 530-752-8428 (Fax) Background MS Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India PhD University of Utah, Salt Lake City, Utah Curriculum Vitae     Detailed Research Projects Multimedia Algorithms and Architectures Low Power Processors and Tile Based Architectures Control Plane Design for Optical Networking Asynchronous Design and Applications Teaching Computer Architecture (EEC 270) Digital System Design (EEC 180B) Embedded System Design Hardware/Software Codesign (EEC 282) Computer Systems and Assembly Language Programming (EEC 70) Introduction to Computer Architecture (EEC 170) Digital Logic Design (EEC 180A) Miscellaneous ICME 2005 Tutorial – Design and Optimization of Adaptive Multimedia Systems Getting Started with IXP-425 StarEast Boards – A Tutorial
